QuestData.Title: Fallowmere Beckons
QuestData.Description: You're still here? What are you waiting for, a personal engraved invitation? Lord Fallowmere beckons, fool! Go to him now!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Lord Fallowmere at Windshear Hold in Stonetalon Mountains.
QuestData.RewardText: Good to see you again, $n. I have some news from Mirkfallon Lake.
